detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, buttons down the front and at the sides and front pockets.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the front and back and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a button-down collar and classic front. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with short frill trims around the neckline and sleeves.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Playsuit in soft, patterned jersey with a slightly wider neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, an elasticated seam and sewn-on tie belt under the tummy, side pockets and short, wide legs.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck and drawstring at the front. Short, flounced sleeves and a flounced hem.
Short, fitted dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Scarf in a soft cashmere weave with fringes along the short sides.
Turban in a soft rib knit.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short sequin-embroidered jacket in woven fabric with bead-embroidered trims. Small stand-up collar, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and wide dolman sleeves. Patterned lining. The jacket is made mainly from recycled polyester.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and legs that can be rolled up with a tab and press-stud.
Straight-style, knee-length, V-neck dress in a textured weave with tassels, buttons down the front and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, tapered legs.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in a soft weave with concealed buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt and pleats for extra width. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif and ribbed neckline.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Calf-length skirt in pleated satin. High, elasticated waist and an overlocked hem. Unlined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Slip in sturdy microfibre with lace details that has a sculpting effect on the waist and back. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbed trims on the short sides. Size 48x200 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Bikini top with a decorative tie detail at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and a fastening at the back.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small frilled collar and an opening at the front with ties at the neckline. Short, raglan butterfly sleeves and elastication at the back of the waist.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round, gathered neckline and V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, a smocked seam under the bust and a seam at the hem for added width. Lined.
Top in soft, lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck opening at the top and a vertical seam down the front.
Lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist, a gathered seam at the hips and a crocheted, scalloped trim at the hem. Lined.
Boxy-style shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Glittery slip-on trainers in fabric with elastic gores in the sides, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Set with a dress, puff pants and hairband in soft organic cotton. Dress with cap sleeves, an opening and button at the back of the neck, a soft jersey bodice, seam at the waist, and skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise details. Puff pants in soft jersey with elastication at the top and hems. Stretchy hairband with a decorative, sewn-on bow.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a square silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.2 cm.
Trousers in imitation leather with decorative stitching front and back, a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline and straight hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Platform sandals in imitation suede with rounded toes and covered block heels. Ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 11.5 cm. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.
Pyjamas in jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Skater skirt in soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an all-over print. Concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut pleated top in jersey with a slight sheen with narrow shoulder straps.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Low waist with wide elastication, and a high cut at the back.
Three thin metal chain necklaces in different designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length from 38-44 cm to 86-92 cm.

Fully lined, super push-up bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Shoulder bag with an imitation suede front, grained imitation leather back, zip and narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 30x36 cm.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs at the top and long sleeves.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a lined gusset, string back and low, V-shaped waist with a wide lace trim.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly and tapered legs with creases and a slit at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit.

All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
